data.title: Directions

data.text:
To Washington-Liberty | To Athletic Venues | To Away Events

Directions to Washington-Liberty High School

From 66 East:

Take the Glebe Rd exit, continue straight ahead (cross Glebe Rd), turn left on Stafford St., pass through the Washington Blvd. light, and the school will be located on your right.

From 66 West:

Take the Glebe Rd. exit, turn left onto Glebe, take the first left onto Washington Blvd., take a left onto Stafford St., school is located on the right.

From Route 50 East:

Take the George Mason Drive exit and turn left on George Mason. Turn right on Henderson Rd. Henderson turns into Quincy St. after you cross Glebe Rd. Turn left on Washington Blvd, then right on Stafford St. The school will be on your right.

From Route 50 West:

Take the Glebe Rd. exit, turn right on Glebe. Turn right on Quincy St. Turn left on Washington Blvd, then right on Stafford St. The school will be on your right.

From Lee Hwy:

Going East on Lee Hwy, pass over Glebe Road, take a right on Quincy St., right on 15th St, and left on Stafford St. The school is located on the left.

From George Washington Parkway:

Going West on George Washington Parkway, take the Spout Run exit, take a right onto Lee Hwy (29), take a left onto Quincy St., right on 15th St, left on Stafford St. The school is located on the left.

Directions to Athletic Venues

War Memorial Stadium: (Band, Field Hockey, Football, Lacrosse, and Soccer)

The stadium is located at the corner of Washington Street and Stafford Street next to Washington-Liberty High School. Recommended parking for stadium events is the 66 parking garage located behind Washington-Lee. the entrance to the stadium in on 16th Rd. Please walk along the Stafford Street sidewalk to the stadium entrance.

Quincy Park: (Baseball, and Tennis)

Quincy Park is located along Quincy Street and Washington Street directly across form Washington-Lee High School.

Washington-Liberty Gymnasium: (Basketball, Gymnastics, Wrestling, and Volleyball)

The Generals gymnasium is located down the hall from Washington-Lee’s Stafford Street doors (marked #1). Recommended parking for gymnasium events is on the 66 parking garage located beside Washington-Liberty.

Washington-Liberty Pool: (Swim and Dive)

The Washington-Liberty Pool entrance is located behind Washington-Lee off of the bus lane (Generals Way) facing Quincy St. Recommended parking for pool events is on the 66 parking garage located beside Washington-Lee. Enter doors under Aquatics Center sign.

Golf, Cross Country, Indoor Track, Cheer, and Rifle events are located off campus. Please see Directions to Away Events for directions.

Directions to Away Events

ANNANDALE HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the beltway, I-495 south toward Richmond. Take Exit 52, Route 236 east toward Annandale. Go .5 mile, then turn right on Heritage Dr. Turn left onto Four Year Run to school on the right.

BROAD RUN HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the Toll Rd, Route 267. Take Exit 53, Route 28 N toward Ashburn. Go 3.5 miles. Left on Waxpool Rd. Go 3.5 miles, then left on Ashburn Rd to 21670 on the left.

CENTREVILLE HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to Exit 53, Route 28, south toward Centreville. Left on New Braddock Rd. Go 1.3 miles, then right on Union Mill Rd. The school is on the left at 6001.

CHANTILLY HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to Exit 55, Fairfax Co. Pkwy. Use Exit 55B toward Reston/Herndon. Left on Fair Lakes Pkwy. Go 1.5 miles, then right on Stringfellow Rd. Go 1.5 miles to 4201.

DOMINION HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the Toll Rd, Route 267. Take Exit 16, Route 7, north toward Leesburg. Go 9.5 miles, then right onto Augusta Dr. The school is past the stop sign at 21326.

EDISON HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the beltway, I-495, south toward Richmond. Take Exit 173, VA-613/Van Dorn St. Turn right toward Franconia. Left on Franconia Rd. The school is on the immediate right.

FAIRFAX HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to Exit 62, Nutley St, south toward Fairfax. Right on Lee Hwy. At Fairfax Circle, go halfway around and continue on Old Lee Highway. The school is on the right at 3500 Old Lee Hwy.

FALLS CHURCH HIGH SCHOOL: Route 29, Lee Hwy, west toward Falls Church. Left on Annandale Rd. Right on Arlington Blvd. Go 1.8 miles, then left on Jaguar Trail. The school is on the right at 7521.

GUNSTON MIDDLE SCHOOL: Glebe Rd south past I-395. Turn left on S Lang St. First left behind shopping center to athletic field.

HAYFIELD HIGH SCHOOL : I-66 west to the beltway, I-495, south toward Richmond. Take Exit 173, VA-613/Van Dorn St. Turn right toward Franconia. Go 1.4 miles, then right on Kingstowne Blvd. Go 1 mile, then left on Hayfield Rd. Go 1 mile, then right on Telegraph Rd.

HERITAGE HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the Toll Rd, Route 267. Take Exit 1A, US-15 Bypass south, toward Leesburg/Warrenton. Go 1 mile, then merge onto S King St / US-15 S toward Warrenton. Go .5 mile, then turn left on Evergreen Mill Rd to 520.

HERNDON HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the Toll Rd, Route 267. Take Exit 11, Fairfax Co. Pkwy north. Left on Wiehle Ave. Left on Dranesville Rd. Left on Bennett St to school on the left.

JEFFERSON HIGH SCHOOL: Route 7 east to Baileys Crossroads. Right on Columbia Pike. Left on Braddock Rd. Cross over Route 236. The school is beyond the bend on the right.

LAKE BRADDOCK HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 to the beltway, I-495, south toward Richmond. Exit 54A, Braddock Rd west. Go 2 miles, then left on Burke Lake Rd. Go .7 mile to 9200 on the right.

LANGLEY HIGH SCHOOL: Glebe Rd north toward Chain Bridge. Left on Route 123. Right on Route 193, Georgetown Pike. Go 1 mile 6520 on the right.

LEE HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the beltway, I-495, south toward Richmond. Take Exit 57A to I-95 S toward Richmond. Merge onto Franconia Rd toward Franconia. Left on Elder Ave, then left on Franconia Rd west to 6540.

LOUDOUN VALLEY HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the Toll Rd, Route 267. Go 28.2 miles. Take Exit 1A, Route 7, west toward Warrenton. Go 9.2 miles. Take the VA-287 exit toward VA-7-BR/Purcellville. Left on Berlin Tnpk. Right on Hirst Rd. Left on N Maple Ave to 340.

MADISON HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to Exit 62, Nutley St, toward Vienna. Go 1.7 mile, then left on Route 123. First right onto James Madison Dr to 2500.

MARSHALL HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to Exit 66B, Route 7, toward Tyson’s Corner. Go 1 mile to school on the left at 7731.

MCLEAN HIGH SCHOOL: Williamsburg Blvd toward Falls Church. Right on Westmoreland St. Go 2.3 miles, then left on Clearview Dr (look for the school sign).

MINNIE HOWARD MIDDLE SCHOOL: (Alexandria): Route 7 East, crossing over I-395. Turn left onto Quaker Lane, then left onto W. Braddock Road. The Field is on the right.

MOUNT VERNON HIGH SCHOOL: Lee Hwy east toward D.C. Left on Spout Run to the George Washington Parkway. Follow the parkway to Mount Vernon, home of George Washington. Stay in the right lane. At the four-way stop, turn right. The school is ~1 mile on left.

OAKTON HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to Exit 62, Nutley St. Keep left at the fork in the ramp. In 1/2 mile, keep right at the fork in the ramp. Left again at the fork in the ramp. Left on Country Creek Rd to end.

OLD REDSKINS PARK: I-66 west to the Toll Rd, Route 267. Take Route 28 South to McLearen Road. Make a Left on Towerview Rd and a left on Redskin Dr. Fields are behind Word of Grace Church, which is one block ahead on the right. Field is behind Center. Observe all parking signs/restrictions.

OSBOURNE PARK HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to Route 28 south to Manassas. Go 6 miles, turn left on Manassas Dr. Turn right on Euclid Ave to the school is on the left.

PARK VIEW HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the Toll Rd, Route 267. Take Exit 16, Route 7, toward Leesburg. Go 9.8 miles, then turn left onto N Sterling Blvd. Go .8 mile, then turn right on West Laurel Ave to 400.

POTOMAC FALLS HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the Toll Rd, Route 267. Take Exit 16, Route 7, toward Leesburg. Go 10 miles, then turn right onto Cascades Pkwy. Turn left on Algonkian Pkwy to 46400 on the left.

ROBINSON HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to Exit 60, Route 123, south toward Fairfax. Go 1.2 miles, then turn left on Braddock Rd. Right on Sideburn Rd to 5035 on the left.

SIMPSON FIELD: Glebe Rd South to Route 1. Turn right onto Rt. 1. Turn right onto Monroe St to 426.

SOUTH COUNTY HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the beltway, I-495, south toward Richmond. Exit 57A to I-95, south toward Richmond. Go 7.6 miles to Exit 163, toward Lorton. Right on Lorton Rd. Right on Silverbrook Rd. Go 1 mile to 8501 on the right.

SOUTH LAKES HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the Toll Rd, Route 267. Take Exit 14, Hunter Mill Rd. Turn left on Hunter Mill Rd. Right on Sunrise Valley Dr. Left on South Lakes Dr. Go 1 mile to 11400.

STONE BRIDGE HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the Toll Rd, Route 267. Take Exit 4, VA-659 N / Belmont Ridge Rd. Turn right onto Hay Rd to 42100.

STUART HIGH SCHOOL: From Seven Corners, follow Route 7 eastbound. Turn right on Patrick Henry Dr. Turn left on Diamond Dr to end.

T.C. WILLIAMS HIGH SCHOOL: Glebe Rd south to I-395 south. Take exit to Quaker Lane. Cross over highway, bear right onto Quaker Lane. Go .5 mile, turn left on Fern St. First right on Kenwood Ave. Left on Leesburg Pike to school on right.

WAKEFIELD HIGH SCHOOL: George Mason Dr. south, for approximately 5 miles. Left at light on S. Dinwiddie St.

WESTFIELD HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to Exit 53, Sully Rd/VA-28 north. Go 2 miles, then West on Westfields Blvd. First right on Stonecroft Blvd. School is about 2 miles ahead on left.

WEST POTOMAC HIGH SCHOOL: Lee Hwy east toward D.C. Left on Spout Run to the George Washington Parkway. Follow the parkway south toward Alexandria. Go through Old Town Alexandria, then right on Belle View Blvd. Turn right on Quander Rd to 6500 on the left.

WEST SPRINGFIELD HIGH SCHOOL: I-66 west to the beltway, I-495, south toward Richmond. Take Exit 54A, Braddock Rd west. Go 2 miles, then left on Burke Lake Rd. Left on Rolling Rd. Go 2 miles to 6100.
